title.value: International Classification of Diseases, 10th Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)

name.value: National Center for Health Statistics/Centers for Disease Control and Prevention

description.value: The International Classification of Diseases, 10th Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM), describes the classification of morbidity and mortality information for statistical purposes and for the indexing of healthcare records by diseases. The ICD-10-CM codes can be used as the value of the Act.cd attribute.

comment.value: Published for many years in HL7 Standards, but has now been superceded. Retained here for backwards-compatibility and convenience.
This is the URL as specified by the terminology owner, and is considereed authoritative.
